***** Bodo (India)[edit] *****
**** Numeral[edit] ****
जि (ji) (Latin script ji)
   1. ten
***** Newar[edit] *****
**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * IPA(key): [d͡ʑi]
**** Pronoun[edit] ****
जि • (ji) (Newa Spelling 𑐖𑐶)
   1. I

**** Etymology[edit] ****
From Proto-Indo-European *gʷey- (“to win, conquer”).
**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * (Vedic) IPA(key): /d͡ʑi/
    * (Classical) IPA(key): /d͡ʑi/
**** Root[edit] ****
जि • (ji)
   1. to win, conquer
   2. to acquire, vanquish, defeat
